title: Autofill could use some tweaks
body: I'm actually not too opposed to autofill in itself, a lot of people hate it, and I don't like getting it, but it does help more people get their roles more often. However I mainly just want to discuss this random glitch in the system, or poor prioritization. I just had a game where I was queueing up as mid, and someone was queueing up as adc primary... I got adc he got mid. That should never happen, should be fixed, it's happened a few time sto me.
